message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate you countering. While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer.  To make this work, I could come down to $2,000,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $2,000,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $1,500,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
